Gavrilović: Izbeći Realovu zamku
06 Nov 2019, 12:44 by Darko
Košarkaši Crvene zvezde će u 7. kolu Evrolige dočekati madridski Real u „Štark areni“, a trener crveno-belih Andrija Gavrilović otkriva recept kojim će se suprotstaviti „kraljevskom klubu“.
– Dobro znamo šta znači ime Reala – najveći mogući brend i ekipa koja bez obzira na formu uvek ima najviše ciljeve u svakoj sezoni. Izašli su iz težeg perioda pobedom u prošlom kolu Evrolige, ali izuzetno je važno da kontrolišemo utakmicu jer je njihov stil igre dobro poznat. Izuzetno brza igra, sa puno šuteva za 3 poena. Zato nam je potrebna izuzetno velika koncentracija kako ne bi upali u zamku brze košarke. Još jednu stvar je važno da napomenem: Naši navijači su nam mnogo pomogli u prethodnim utakmicama. Gde god da igramo da li je “Štark Arena” ili hala “Aleksandar Nikolić” mi to čujemo, reagujemo na to, mnogo nam znači u svakoj utakmici, posebno ovakvoj protiv protivnika ovog renomea, rekao je trener crveno-belih, koji će spisak 12 igrača koji će istrčati na parket Arene odrediti na dan utakmice.
I Ognjen Dobrić veruje da Zvezda uz pomoć sa tribina može do pobede:
– Očekuje nas još jedna velika utakmica u Areni, protiv ekipe i kluba za koji se zna šta predstavlja u evropskoj košarci. Ekipa Reala nije pretrpela velike izmene u odnosu na prošlu sezonu, ali i dalje imaju veliki kvalitet, dobro se poznaju, uigrani su, igraju izuzetno brzo. Uz sve to, znaju se ciljevi takvog kluba u svakoj sezoni. Polako hvatamo ritam, zabeležili smo dve izuzetno važne pobede, a utakmica sa Realom je sama po sebi nešto više i još veći izazov. Moramo da odigramo odličnu utakmicu, da se držimo dogovora iz svlačionice, da budemo čvrsti u odbrani, a uz punu Arenu i podršku naših navijača uz ogromnu energiju na terenu i sa tribina, verujem da imamo našu šansu, izjavio je Dobrić.
Utakmica između Crvene zvezde i Reala se igra u četvrtak od 19 časova.

Gavrilovic: Avoid Real's trap
06 Nov 2019, 11:44 by Darko
The Red Star basketball players will meet Madrid Real at Stark Arena in the 7th round of the Euroleague, and the Red and White coach Andrija Gavrilovic unveils a recipe to counter the Royal Club.
- We know full well what Real's name means - the biggest possible brand and team that, regardless of form, always has the highest goals in every season. They came out of a difficult period by winning the Euroleague last round, but it is extremely important that we control the game because their style of play is well known. Extremely fast game, with plenty of 3-point shots. That is why we need extremely high concentration so that we do not fall into the trap of fast basketball. Another thing to note: Our fans have helped us a lot in our previous games. Wherever we play whether the Stark Arena or the Aleksandar Nikolic Hall, we hear it, we react to it, it means a lot to us in every game, especially this one against opponents of this denomination, said the Red and White coach, who will list 12 The players who will run to the Arena floor will be designated on the match day.
Ognjen Dobric also believes that with the help of the stands, Zvezda can win:
- We are expecting another big game in the Arena, against a team and a club known for what it is in European basketball. The Real team have not undergone major changes since last season, but they still have great quality, they know each other well, they are playful, they play extremely fast. With all this, one knows the goals of such a club in every season. We are slowly picking up the rhythm, we have recorded two extremely important victories, and the match with Real is in itself a bit more and even more of a challenge. We need to play a great game, to keep the locker room deal, to be firm on defense, and with the full Arena and the support of our fans with tremendous energy on the field and from the stands, I believe we have our chance, said Dobric.
The match between Red Star and Real Madrid is played on Thursday from 7pm.
